collabpads-desc: Allows collaborative editing of wiki pages
collabpads-content-action-tooltip: Start a collaborative editing session and invite others to join
collabpads-start-dialog-message: In "Edit together" mode, multiple users can collaborate simultaneously to edit the page.
collabpads-leave-dialog-message: Are you sure you want to leave? Any participants and unsaved changes will remain.
collabpads-reset-changes-dialog-message: Are you sure you want to reset to the last saved version?
collabpads-reset-changes-tooltip: Reset to the last saved version
collabpads-clipboard-copy-fail: Failed to copy URL to clipboard
collabpads-already-participating-message: You are already editing this page
collabpads-bs-saferedit-editing: This page is currently being edited in "Edit together" mode. $1
collabpads-normal-edit-blocked: Normal editing is blocked if a collaborative session is already running on the page.
collabpads-out-of-sync: Your client is out of sync with the server. The page will reload to re-establish the connection.
collabpads-invalid-change-dialog-message: Error applying change. Try to reload the page to re-establish the connection. If you still see the error, either save the changes or delete the session
collabpads-invalid-initialization-dialog: This page contains content that cannot be edited using the collaborative editor. Please delete the session
